gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 121, Clippers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: Philadelphia defeats Los Angeles, 121-107. For Philadelphia, Tyrese Maxey led the way with 24 points and six assists while aided by Tobias Harris (24 points, four rebounds, four assists) and Cameron Payne (23 points (five 3PM), five rebounds, two blocks) in the victory. Kawhi Leonard finished with 20 points, six rebounds, and three assists with Norman Powell recording 20 points (three 3PM) for Los Angeles in the losing effort. Philadelphia improves to 39-32, while Los Angeles moves to 44-26 in the loss.
